short_summary: Soliciting bid for real estate services for the Ecological Gifts Program. The goal is to assemble a team of qualified appraisers for the program and administer the requirements of the Appraisal Review Panel Operational Guidelines (2019).
description: seeking a contractor to assemble a team of qualified real estate appraisers to review appraisals for the Ecological Gifts Program. Other qualifications include:, managing the operations of the Appraisal Review Panel, making recommendations to the Minister of Environment and Climate Change.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

### Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites interested suppliers to bid on the request for proposal (RFP) for the Ecological Gifts Program (EGP) - Appraisal Review Panel Manager. The successful contractor will be responsible for assembling a team of qualified real estate appraisers from across Canada to form the independent Appraisal Review Panel (ARP) for the EGP.

### Scope of Work

The successful contractor will be required to:

* Assemble a team of qualified real estate appraisers from across Canada to form the independent Appraisal Review Panel (ARP) for the EGP
* Administer the requirements of the Appraisal Review Panel Operational Guidelines (2019)
* Identify a qualified senior appraiser to lead and manage the operations of the ARP for the entire contract period
* Provide recommendations to the federal Minister of Environment and Climate Change regarding the fair market value of ecological gifts

### Contract Duration

The period of the contract is from the contract award date or April 1, 2024 (whichever is later) to March 31, 2028. The contractor grants Canada the irrevocable option to extend the term of the contract by up to one additional year period under the same conditions.

### Eligibility and Requirements

All interested suppliers may submit a bid. The contractor must have the necessary qualifications, experience, and resources to successfully complete the scope of work.

### Contact Information

For further information, please contact:

* Yvonne Ocheoha, Procurement Specialist
* PSPC
* Email: [yvonne.ocheoha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:yvonne.ocheoha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Notice Information

* RFP Reference Number: WS4218450723-Doc4444074664
* RFP Publication Date: February 14, 2024
* RFP Closing Date: April 2, 2024, at 14:00:00 EST
* RFP Notice URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18794686?extsite=MTg3OTQ2ODZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18794686?extsite=MTg3OTQ2ODZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
